18#if HAVE_MKDTEMP
19
20/* Get mkdtemp() declaration. */
21#include <stdlib.h>
22
23#else
24
25/* Create a unique temporary directory from TEMPLATE.
26 The last six characters of TEMPLATE must be "XXXXXX";
27 they are replaced with a string that makes the directory name unique.
28 Returns TEMPLATE, or a null pointer if it cannot get a unique name.
29 The directory is created mode 700. */
30extern char * mkdtemp (char *template);
31
32#endif
33
